page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: The area we have studied is a{rural area.It is quite hilly and is mainly covered by{woodland}and farmland.There are no housing estates or shopping areas but lots of farms.Most of the farms grow crops such as wheat and barley,but some keep pigs and a few sheep.There are two main roads running through the area,the A614 Ollerton road and the A60 Mansfield road.They are both very busy roads.As well as the farms the main places of interest in our area are:the{Burnstump country park, the {Burnstump pub,Seven mile house ,the{Police}Headquarters,the {Park private hospital}and the {Chinchilla ranch.
